Title: Golden Pass LNG works to speed up as court approves settlement
Description: Work to complete the 15.6 mtpa Golden Pass LNG export project in Texas might speed up following a court's approval of the settlement agreement allowing the joint venture to choose a new contractor to take over the development.
Author: JS

Title: US Senators present legislation to speed up LNG approvals
Description: US Senators Joe Manchin and John Barrasso, on behalf of the Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee, presented the Energy Permitting Reform Act of 2024, designed to accelerate the permitting process for energy infrastructure, including LNG, and to put an end to the Biden Administration’s permitting pause.
Author: JS

Title: Cheniere’s Corpus Christi Stage 3 project reaches 62.4% completion
Description: Cheniere Energy’s 10 mtpa Corpus Christi Stage 3 expansion project reaches 62.4% completion in June, with the start-up still slated ahead of schedule at the end of 2024.
Author: JS

Title: Scarborough and Pluto Train 2 project 67% completed; first LNG still on track for 2026
Description: Australian independent Woodside Energy remains on track to produce the first LNG from its Scarborough energy project in Western Australia in 2026, with Scarborough and Pluto Train 2 projects 67% completed at the end of June.
Author: CK
